mdRecord.dcterms:title: Declaration of Independence, 1776, 1888 / compliments of the Inquirer Printing Co
Compliments of the Inquirer Printing Co
United States. Declaration of Independence
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Albert H. Small Declaration of Independence Collection (University of Virginia)
Bedford inquirer (Bedford, Pa. : 1888)
United States.
United States. Continental Congress.
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Text printed in blue, in three columns. At the top of the sheet, the United States flag is shown between two images of a newsboy displaying a copy of the "Inquirer, the leading paper in Bedford County." The whole within a red rule border.
SPECIAL COLLECTIONS: Albert H. Small Declaration of Independence Collection. Deposit of Albert H. Small, July 14, 2003.
